screen.name: ChoiceBox
screen.title: Input
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 10, textsize[1] + 10) count = len(self.list) if count > 11: count = 11 offset = 40 * count wsizex = textsize[0] + 10 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset + 10 if (900 > wsizex): wsizex = 900 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex - 20, 40 * count) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint((1920-wsizex)/2, (1080-wsizey)/(count > 7 and 2 or 3)))

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 9), size = (710, 35), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), MultiContentEntryPixmap(pos = (10, 7), size = (60, 40), png = 2), ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 32)], "itemHeight": 55 }

screen.name: MessageBoxTemplate
screen.applet: self.autoResize() from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 105, textsize[1] + 30) count = len(self.list) offset = 40 * count wsizex = textsize[0] + 100 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset + 10 if (600 > wsizex): wsizex = 600 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex - 20, 40 * count) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))
